__e: A bottle of your best cognac and fresh horses for the men.
Er... it's a little bit to do with the... brandy glass and, er a little bit to do with that woman... you met today Only... please let me finish before you say anything
No, no, thank you. I never drink more than one brandy, and even this is sometimes too much. I'll just finish my coffee.
# Brandy's the very best drink in the world # # If you drink enough your toes get curled ##
Well, I will be... just as soon as I knock off this bottle of brandy.
After a few minutes he came to his senses, realized shrewdly that he wasn't dead after all, and after only a few too many brandies lurched off home.
